des: "Lactose-free and very filling, perfect for a healthy start to any morning. Add whey protein mix to add an extra long-lasting energy boost. Start the night before for fresh homemade almond milk or pick up a carton at your local grocery store to save time"
ins: Combine almond milk, banana, dark chocolate, and protein powder in a blender; blend until smooth.
